entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sandy Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:15 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -34.9°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:48 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:48 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
